content: When you set exposed filters in a View, you can check a box to have the site "remember" the last filters, so when people come back to that View the exposed filters are pre-filled. Is there anything similar for Pager values? (e.g. if you click on a node on page 5, then click "Back" in your browser, can you end up back on page 5 instead of back to page 1?)
I think that is because you have Use AJAX: set to Yes in your view.

Ah, maybe it was set on that View... I'll double check whether it's needed. I guess the question stands if anyone knows a way to "remember" that sort of thing. I was looking at this one as a potential: https://www.drupal.org/project/views_ajax_history
